com.escape.games.model
Class Material

java.lang.Object
  com.escape.games.model.Material
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompositeMaterial, LightingMaterial, PerVertexMaterial, TextureMaterial, UniformMaterial
public abstract class Material
extends java.lang.Object

Base implementation for materials. Material is the mechanism to set shader parameters.

Author:
escape-llc
